item.title: [WIP] Installing WSL 2 on Windows 10 AME
item.description: Please note that this article was underwritten. The article will be ready in a few hours. I’ve been using Windows 10 AME as my primary operating system for several months now, with a little break in the form of using vanilla Windows 10/11. Despite the fact that I do not use GNU/Linux desktop for several reasons, I still prefer to use at least one GNU/Linux distribution via WSL 2 to develop my projects and more.
